{{Wired embedded system |brand=Gateworks |model=Ventana GW5300 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=single-board computer, wired embedded board |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=8-60 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=i.MX6 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model= |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, Micro SD, SIM |expansion_minipcie_num=4 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, HDMI out, LVDS, AV input |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt; |tp_firmware=Android |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} For a list of all currently documented '''Freescale''' chipsets with specifications, see '''[[Freescale]]'''. ---- {{TagLine|Ventana GW5300 Network Processor}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.gateworks.com/product/item/ventana-gw5300-network-processor}}
[http://trac.gateworks.com/wiki/ventana ''Ventana Family Support'' on the '''Gateworks''' Wiki]
Additional specifications, per '''Gateworks''''s site, follow... *Operating current + pwr. consumption: 0.17A typical @ 24VDC, ~ 4W *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::105 mm x 200 mm x 13 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::85 g]]
